thread.title: Bastian Schweinsteiger set to be recalled to Manchester United's Europa League squad
thread.title_full: Bastian Schweinsteiger set to be recalled to Manchester United's Europa League squad

author: Simon Mullock
title: Bastian Schweinsteiger set to be recalled to Manchester United's Europa League squad
text:
Sport Bastian Schweinsteiger set to be recalled to Manchester United's Europa League squad The German has trained his way back into Jose Mourinho's plans after he dug his heels in at Old Trafford Share Schweinsteiger's United days looked numbered at the start of the season (Photo: Mark Thompson / Getty) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Jose Mourinho is ready to restore Bastian Schweinsteiger to Manchester United's Europa League squad. 
The German midfielder has trained his way back into the United manager's plans after refusing the chance to quit Old Trafford in the summer. 
He was left out of United's European squad for the group stages. 
But the 32-year-old will come into Mourinho's thinking for a place on the bench for today's FA Cup clash with Wigan. Schweinsteiger could feature against Wigan (Photo: Reuters) 
And Mourinho said: Bastian stayed in Manchester when we played Hull, so normally he will come into the squad. 
"As for the Europe, yes of course." 
Schweinsteiger's recall comes after fellow midfielder Sean Goss left the club in a £500,000 deal with QPR. 
Sean Goss has left to join Queens Park Rangers for a transfer fee of £500,000. 
The 21-year-old moved to Old Trafford from Exeter in 2012 but never made a first-team appearance for the Red Devils. poll loading Manchester United fans! Bastian Schweinsteiger - keep or sell? 0+ VOTES SO FAR
